_meta.source: Researched from Galveston tourism, Port of Galveston, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers cruise port, Strand district, seawall, and Moody Gardens

transit_routes.name: Walk to Strand
transit_routes.note: Historic Strand district is walkable from cruise port.

transit_routes.name: Trolley to Seawall
transit_routes.note: Vintage rail trolley runs along Seawall Blvd. Fun and affordable way to explore.

featured_experiences.name: The Strand Historic District
featured_experiences.note: Texas's largest collection of Victorian commercial buildings. Walking distance from port.

featured_experiences.name: Seawall & Pleasure Pier
featured_experiences.note: Beach, pier rides, restaurants along boulevard. Good family option.

featured_experiences.name: Moody Gardens
featured_experiences.note: Three glass pyramids with aquarium and exhibits. 15 minutes from port by car.
